Description: US Buyers: No taxes, duties or brokerage fees Guitar comes with non original Hagstrom case in very good condition. Some scratches and small dings on the outside of the case. Overall condition: - Guitar is in very good condition - Neck is straight - Frets are in excellent condition - All electronics work as they should - Light surface swirling from playing - Surface scratches / small finish bumps / dings over the body (Front and back). Some are visible and other ones too small to show on pictures.....but they are there - Some light edge wear - No structural damage - Wall hanger mark on each side of the headstock. (chemical reaction between the rubber and the nitro finish) More pictures available upon request Specifications: - Weight: 7 lbs 15 oz - 50' neck profile - Dog ear P90 pickup - Rosewood Fingerboard - Faded finish - Wrap around bridge - Mahogany body - Kluson Tuners Some suggestions: Please note that some settings on this guitar like action, intonation, neck adjustment etc .....may need to be adjusted to your specific style of playing. Also once you have received the guitar you should leave the instrument in the case for at least 6 hours, so the instrument can acclimate to its new environment Return and refund procedure: Item can be returned within 3 days of receipt. - Item arrived damaged or not as described: Full refund and seller pays for the return shipping costs - The customer didn't like the item (color, tone, neck size, weight etc....): Full refund less 10% restocking fee and buyer pays for the return shipping costs. - No partial refund. - Refund will be issued once the guitar is back in the sellers hand Carriers: - USPS for the United States - Canada Post for Canada
